arts.ttl: Bayern Munich make call on January move for Barcelona star Dani Olmo
arts.sum: The brass at German giants Bayern Munich have come to a decision on a potential winter swoop for Barcelona star Dani Olmo. That’s according to Diario Sport, citing BILD, who…

arts.ttl: Match Awards from Bayern Munich’s dominating win against RB Salzburg
arts.sum: Bayern Munich played their first game of the year against RB Salzburg in a friendly face-off, here’s our awards for the game! The defender put in a good shift, despite having conceded three goals in the half he was playing.

arts.ttl: Bavarian Podcast Works: Postgame Show — Red Bull Salzburg 0-6 Bayern Munich (Friendly)
arts.sum: Bayern Munich used the preparation wisely and actually looked good in dispatching Red Bull Salzburg. Bayern Munich travelled to Salzburg to take on the local Red Bull outfit for a friendly — and the Bavarians took full advantage of the home side’s hospitality for a 6-0 victory.

arts.ttl: Four Observations from Bayern Munich’s highly enjoyable 6-0 dismantling of RB Salzburg
arts.sum: Bayern Munich steamrollered RB Salzburg 6-0 in an utterly dominant friendly performance. The latter, for his part, looked off when he came on against Salzburg and it took him a while to match the pace of the friendly game.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich continue to monitor Viktor Gyökeres
arts.sum: According to Florian Plettenberg, Bayern Munich are continuing to monitor Sporting CP striker Viktor Gyökeres. It is no secret that Gyökeres is currently one of the most sought-after strikers in…

arts.ttl: Report: Bayern Munich won’t indulge in potential Dani Olmo sweepstakes
arts.sum: Bayern are not considering Dani Olmo and not working on any potential move, not even on a free transfer, regardless of the outcome of his Barcelona case. Olmo is a player who Bayern Munich has had longstanding interest in, but the timing does not appear to be right.

arts.ttl: Good news and bad news for Bayern Munich’s walking wounded
arts.sum: While Coman, Gnabry, Neuer and Stanišić are back with the team, João Palhinha is still training individually and is expected to join team training at the end of the coming week or the beginning of the following week. Bayern Munich stars Kingsley Coman, Serge Gnabry, Manuel Neuer and Josip Stanišić have all rejoined team training.

arts.ttl: RB Salzburg vs Bayern Munich: Live stream, game time thread, odds, prediction, how to watch
arts.sum: Bayern Munich will take a quick trip to Austria for a friendly with RB Salzburg. Bayern will use the game as a tune-up for the Gladbach match this upcoming weekend.

arts.ttl: Nathaniel Brown, Michael Olise and Lasse Rosenboom nominated for December Rookie of the month
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt's Nathaniel Brown, Michael Olise of Bayern Munich and Holstein Kiel's Lasse Rosenboom are up for nomination from December 2024 – vote for your favourite now! The Bundesliga honours the best young talents in the league with the Rookie of the Month Award, in association with Sorare.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich Alumni: Javi Martínez recalls Jamal Musiala’s early days in the senior squad
arts.sum: With how much he has accomplished in such a short period of time, it already feels like ages ago that Jamal Musiala made his breakthrough into the Bayern Munich senior squad along with the German national team. In that season, Musiala made a total of 39 appearances across all competitions, tallying seven goals and one assist.
